meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chip Bell Jennifer Cross Miller Karen Ruckert Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6759.

td.p: Chip Bell, a telecom engineer from Marysville, Ohio
Jennifer Cross Miller, a communications manager from Pacheco, California
Karen Ruckert, a civil rights attorney originally from Topeka, Kansas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,400)

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In book 1,
"The ____ Hat"')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):
Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: READ THE BOOK, SAW IT ON HBO

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_2_4', 'clue_DJ_2_4_stuck', '(Karen: Um...What is...uh...What is an ellipsis?)
(Alex: Oh, sorry. You\'re so close. What is an [*]. Two different things.)

ellipse

Jennifer
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_2_4', 'clue_DJ_2_4_stuck', 'Johannes Kepler used this geometric figure to describe the orbits of the planets, with the Sun as a focus')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_3_4', 'clue_DJ_3_4_stuck', '(Jennifer: What\'s the Democratic
Republic of Congo?)
(Alex: Yeah,
we\'ll accept that.
[*]. But we\'re giving you a yes on that.)
(Jennifer: Thank you. Appreciate that.)

Democratic Republic of the Congo

Jennifer
')
div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_DJ_3_4', 'clue_DJ_3_4_stuck', '(Sarah of the Clue Crew presents the clue.) It\'s bordered by nine countries, the most
for any African nation. It also has one of the continent\'s wordiest names')

for any African nation. It also has one of the continent's wordiest names

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Alex: [After revealing Chip\'s response] Many people have done it since, but he was the first to conquer Mount Everest. And 2003 was the 50th anniversary. You\'re right.)
KarenWho is Prince Charles?
$2,900
JenniferWho is the Dalai Lama
$8,000
ChipWho is Hillary?
$8,300
(Edmund) Hillary')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'During a jubilee celebration in 2003, he became the first foreigner to be made an honorary citizen of Nepal')

tr.td: During a jubilee celebration in 2003, he became the first foreigner to be made an honorary citizen of Nepal

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
